item.title: My Ham Memory Channels
item.description: This is a list of my own HAM radio memory channels. The majority of these will be for repeaters near my home in Roy, UT. Ch Frequency PL Name Location 001 147.040 + 123.0 DCARC Repeater Antelope Island 002 146.900 - 123.0 OARC Repeater Mount Ogden 003 447.200 - 127.3 DCARC Repeater Antelope Island 004 448.600 - 123.
